setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the form landmark, and hides the 'Top' link
task: navigate forwards to a text input inside a form landmark
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Name' text input.
output_assertions: Name of the group, 'Add Contact', is conveyed
Name of the input, 'Name', is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
